body:
Alright, so I'm currently working on an iPhone/iPad game, and I'm in need of someone who is good at graphic design.

Criteria:
- Good at Adobe Photoshop and Illustrator
- Must be able to draw icons, and a background image
- Have a good eye for simplistic design and layout
- Can create images fast, and good quality
- Have Skype

I am willing to pay, so if you're interested please contact me on Skype, thanks! :D
body_tagged:
